FacilityName: HERMAN OIL BULK STORAGE - TIOGA ND

_exec_summary.SummaryText: The accidental release and prevention emergency response policies at this facililty: This facililty complies with NFPA-58 requirements for LP-Gas Storage, and it is our policy to adhere to all applicable federal, state and loal laws. If an emergency would occur, it is our policy to notified the Tioga Fire Department as well as the Williston Fire Department and request that they respond to the emergency. Description of this facility and the regulated sustances handled: There is a 30,000 storage tank  OM in which propane is stored for delivery to customers. ACCIDENTAAL RELEASE PREVENTION STEPS TAKEN: The facility is constantly monitored daily for faulty equpment that needs to be repaired or replaced. The faility compliles with EPA's accidental prevention and all applicable state and local codes and regulations. This propane system is designed, installed and maintained in accordance with NFPA-58 and State Laws. FIVE YEAR ACCIDENTAL HISTORY: This facility has hadno accidents involving propane, that have caused deaths, injuries to humans or animals, property or environmental damage, evaculations or sheltering in place. EMERGENCY RESPONSE PROGRAM: In the event of an emergency involving our propane, it is our policy the Tioga Fire Department and the Williston Fire Department and rquest that they respond to the emergency. We have discussed this policy with Emergency Management Department and the Fire Departments. PLANNED CHANGES TO IMPROVE SAFETY: We will continue to require that those handling propane to take the necessary training made available to them and to obey all the Federal, State and Lcoal Laws. Any faulty equipment will be replaced and inspections will be made regularly to maintain the safety of the environment and people in the surrounding community.
